item.title: Ground Proximity Warning System – Terrain Awareness and Warning System (TAWS) EGPWS – Terrain Display Functions

note.para: Refer to MEL 34-58-1-2 for CDTI EGPWS Terrain Display.
Must be operative for dispatch into LPB, UIO, BOG, GUA, TGA.

placard.para: Placard near EICAS "ENHANCED GPWS INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
